item.title: Business AI Platform
item.description:
In view of the needs of large-scale commercial sales forecasting, supply and demand, auxiliary decision-making and other needs in the field of Commerce and Trade industry, the commerce and trade AI platform extracts reusable AI modules for commerce and trade applications from a large number of applications, such as community demand forecasting and region demand forecasting, and arranges open modules to make many intelligent functions build intelligent applications like building blocks.

  • Community Demand Forecast

  • Community Consumption Forecast

  • Region Demand Forecast

  • Region Consumption Forecast

  • Category Sales Forecast

  • Product Sales Forecast
